idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows XP Version 5.1 (Build 2600) Service Pack 3; ESRI ArcCatalog 9.3.1.4000

descript.abstract: This layer identifies designated critical habitat for the Cape Sable Seaside Sparrow under the Endangered Species Act.
descript.purpose: Geographic Information System (GIS) data for the designation of critical habitat of the Cape Sable seaside sparrow (Ammodramus maritimus mirabilis): These GIS data and their associated coordinates are not the definitive source for determining the critical habitat boundaries for the Cape Sable seaside sparrow. As noted in the final rule, the textual unit descriptions constitute the legal source for determining the critical habitat boundaries. Users of these GIS data are cautioned to refer to the final textual unit descriptions provided in the final rule as the definitive source in determining critical habitat areas. Additionally, interested parties are encouraged to contact the U.S. Fish and Wildlife Service for a definitive finding of whether a location is within critical habitat.

citeinfo.origin: G. Dennis - Checked against written description on 9-30-03.
citeinfo.title: Cape Sable Seaside Sparrow Designated Critical Habitat in Everglades National Park

serinfo.issue: Cape Sable seaside sparrow (Ammodramus maritimus mirabilis)

citeinfo.title: 72 FR 62735 62766 Critical Habitat Revised Designation for the Cape Seaside Sparrow: Final Rule

idinfo.accconst: These data are not to be redistributed to anyone. These data shall be obtained directly from the appropriate USFWS (see Section 6.1 Distributor) office or official USFWS internet web page (http://criticalhabitat.fws.gov/), when available.
idinfo.useconst: hese data are final critical habitat units for the Cape Sable seaside sparrow. These data are to be used only in the context of the definition and purpose of critical habitat. This primarily relates to Section 7 consultation under the Endangered Species Act. These data may be used for planning and land management purposes. They are not to be used for legal survey use. NOTE: The legal boundaries are verbally described in the Federal Register.

As noted in the final rule, the textual unit descriptions constitute the legal source for determining the critical habitat boundaries. Users of these GIS data are cautioned to refer to the final textual unit descriptions provided in the final rule as the definitive source in determining critical habitat areas. Consts.useLimit: These data are final critical habitat units for the Cape Sable seaside sparrow. These data are to be used only in the context of the definition and purpose of critical habitat. This primarily relates to Section 7 consultation under the Endangered Species Act. These data may be used for planning and land management purposes. They are not to be used for legal survey use. NOTE: The legal boundaries are verbally described in the Federal Register.

metainfo.metstdn: FGDC Content Standards for Digital Geospatial Metadata

distinfo.distliab: The U.S. Fish & Wildlife Service (USFWS) shall not be held liable for improper or incorrect use of the data described and/or contained herein. These data are not to be redistributed to anyone. These data shall be obtained directly from the appropriate USFWS (see Section 6.1 Distributor) office or official USFWS internet web page (http://criticalhabitat.fws.gov/), when available. This disclaimer applies both to individual use of the data and aggregated use with other data. This map is provided only for illustrative purposes of Cape Sable seaside sparrow critical habitat. For the precise legal definition of critical habitat, please refer to the narrative unit descriptions.

overview.eaover: Area and Acres are the attribute fields.
overview.eadetcit: AREA and ACRES calculated by XTools 2.2

cntorgp.cntorg: South Florida Ecological Service Office, U.S. Fish & Wildlife Service

procstep.procdesc: Description can be found on 72 FR 6273562766 pages 62751 - 62754
Polygon shapefile was converted to an ArcInfo coverage for a logical consistency check.

cntperp.cntorg: South Florida Ecological Service Office, U.S. Fish & Wildlife Service

procstep.procdesc: The polygon ArcInfo coverage was converted back to a shapefile. The field attributes added by ArcInfo were deleted. The Attributes "Area" and "Acres" were created and updated by XTools 2.2. The attribute fields "Area" and "Acres" were then restructed using XTools 2.2 so that "Area" is an integar and "Acres" has only one decimal.

cntperp.cntorg: South Florida Ecological Service Office, U.S. Fish & Wildlife Service

attracc.attraccr: \ACRES" attributes were updated to verify their accuracy on 11/23/2009.

qattracc.attracce: Deductinve estimate. Since the attributes were created by a reliable software (XTools 5.3), it can be assumed that they are correct.

dataqual.logic: The shapefile was visually examined with a recent aerial photo as a background.

horizpa.horizpar: Horizontal accuracy is within the national map accuracy standards for 1:24,000 GIS data.

qhorizpa.horizpav: 90% of identifiable points are within 1/50th of an inch (40 feet).
